Suukie walked through the battlefield, getting shot by about every blast th=
at came his way....he walked along, laughing despite half dead from all of =
the shots.......he continued to shoot at whomever he saw outside of the Ark=
 or the base.....he shot and shot and shot....Plintissa came running up beh=
ind him with a shield and grabbed him, dragging him over to safety...... "w=
hat do you think your doing?" says Plintissa.... "let me go, or your head o=
ff it will blow!...." Suukie yelled......he jerked Plintissa up from behind=
 and threw her down......he looked at her sadly.......not knowing why he wo=
uld do such a thing.....he picked her up and started to punch her in the he=
ad!....she wrestled him around, and they wrestled up a tree, but Suukie gra=
bbed her and kicked her off the edge....she was hanging on the tree.......S=
uukie came up and looked down at her, but the look was not cold...... "look=
, Suukie, we can work this out, you won't get into trouble, we'll help you!=
...." she said....Suukie looked at her again...this time it was cold......h=
e kicked her hand loose and fired upon her, hurting her into the side of th=
e Ark and onto a broken off autogun, which impaled her there, unable to mov=
e with a spike through her, Plintissa fired upon Suukie......he moved out o=
f the way by jumping down the tree, and got shot by many of her shots......=
..but he continued.......Gangon stood in front of BrightBlade yet again, tr=
ying to protect her as Suukie came closer.....Suukie held his chest and hea=
d in pain.......he had never got so hurt in his life.....he pulled his swor=
d and Gangon fired upon the slightly large bot, bringing him to his knees..=
....Gangon stood his ground firing.......Suukie's large hand lunged out and=
 grabbed the small Gangon around the neck and Suukie started to squeeze....=
.Gangon started to slip into stasis lock from suffocation.........Suukie lo=
oked at BrightBlade, a sad look on his face again..........
